title: Unable to reinstall League of Legends
body:
Hey guys,

I recently decided to get back into LOL but came across a problem while trying to download it. After opening the launcher, and finishing the setup I am greeted with an error message that says "the older version of League of Legends cannot be removed. Please contact your technical support group". My first thought was to go into my programs and simply try to uninstall the old version of league (which I had already uninstalled once). I tried to uninstall league from my programs in control panel, but it said that it was unable to uninstall it. However, when I search for league I'm unable to open anything related to the game which is extremely puzzling. Basically the my computer thinks the game is installed (it's not), but I'm unable to open the game. I will list below all the various things I have tried to resolve this issue. Any other ideas would be appreciated. 

1. Tried manually finding any files related to League of Legends and deleted them.
2. Cleaned my registry with CCleaner and it didn't work
3. Tried installing league with the local administrator account but for some reason when I log in to the administrator account, I'm unable to do anything. I cant open any applications, my desktop is black, I cant use the windows search bar, I genuinely cant do a thing.


Please if anyone has any clue at all as to what I could do to resolve this issue I would appreciate it immensely.

Thanks in advance.

replies.body: It sounds like the client wasn't initially removed as intended, but no worries.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to help!  There will be an option to reinstall, which should automatically repair the issue.  Let me know if you have any questions!
OMG THANK U! Like the dude before me said "not all heroes wear capes" ! :D Thank you again! <3

It worked.

Words can't explain how much I love you in the most non homosexual way possible. I have been trying to figure this out for days. Not all heroes wear capes.

thank you m8

The hextech repair tool isnt working for me. i try to reinstall the game but i need to find a file i deleted, lol.launcher.exe. i actually tried deleting all of the LoL files and now idk what to do. PLEASE HELP ME. when i go and try to uninstall the game from my computer i need to fine a file, LoL.Na.msi but my computer was unable to find it.

Holy necro post!  Performing a clean reinstall through the HRT should fix up any missing files.  It's more likely thought that a security setting or antivirus is blocking some files from being accessed, and acting as if it's missing.  Just in case, run through the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure that League is being added as an exception.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=viATZ7AB,comment-id=000000040000,timestamp=2017-06-03T16:41:47.626+0000)
>
> Holy necro post!  Performing a clean reinstall through the HRT should fix up any missing files.  It's more likely thought that a security setting or antivirus is blocking some files from being accessed, and acting as if it's missing.  Just in case, run through the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure that League is being added as an exception.

I have the same problem, did everything but i keep having the same problem .... i deleted absolutly everything but when i want to install it back it says  "the older version of League of Legends cannot be removed
:(

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=viATZ7AB,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-04T15:36:24.947+0000)

There will be an option to reinstall, which should automatically repair the issue.  Let me know if you have any questions!

I'm having the same problem. In the hextech repair tool, it seems I need to find and select the lol.launcher.exe file in the directory where League of Legends is installed for it to work, but I deleted it. How can I find this and reinstall the game?

I know this is an old post, but I tried the Hextech repair tool when I had the same issue. I get an unexpected error 1610 and it still fails to install telling me that the older version cannot be removed. I have included the log.

Hey everyone.

If you're still unable to uninstall League due to missing installation files you've definitely got a registry issue. Sometimes CCleaner can fix this but for me it wasn't the case.

Download this microsoft registry fixing tool and retry.

https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/help/17588/fix-problems-that-block-programs-from-being-installed-or-removed

Hope this helps if nothing else does, like for me.
